name: Talon_Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Talon_Stunning_Shot
display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Talon_Entangling_Arrow
display_help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast

name: Talon_Aimed_Shot
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Talon_Fistful_of_Arrows
display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Talon_Explosive_Arrow
display_help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Talon_Rain_of_Arrows
display_help: You unleash a Rain of Arrows on a targeted location, damaging foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long

name: Talon_Flash_Arrow
display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to Accuracy. Recharge: Slow

name: Talon_Aimed_Shot
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Brawl
display_help: A smashing blow with a bow.

name: Brawl
display_help: A swift kick to the head.

name: Talon_Snap_Shot
display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Talon_Strike
display_help: Basic stabbing and cutting blade.

name: Fly
display_help: Wing Agents can fly through the use of their jet packs.
